# vImageCVImageFormat.Format.formatOneComponent16Half

**Case**

A little-endian 16-bit, single-componennt pixel format.

## Declaration

```swift
case formatOneComponent16Half
```

## Single-component format constants

- **vImageCVImageFormat.Format.formatOneComponent8**: An 8-bit, single-component pixel format with black equal to zero.
- **vImageCVImageFormat.Format.formatOneComponent32Float**: A little-endian 32-bit, single-component pixel format.

items.description: An 8-bit, single-component pixel format with black equal to zero.
